nice if you think that way  but at least that's what the harsh reality i'm seeing.
my mum hires people and i know what are the pre requisites.
Just jump into the cs bandwagon and get your 5k median expz

If u can justify why u are worth that much to ur boss  as I said  in the end u will get that amountBut of course  like you said  not all bosses are willing to raise one's salary even if the justification is valid
so I can retain u and continue making money off u
in the end u jump ship
it's not underpaying because you dont have the qualifications lol
as long as u bring in more money than you r being paid
if you have a degree you'll definitely get a higher pay than people who don't.
do you know about maximising revenue tho?
if you can pay workers lesser and get more money  why would you pay your workers more and decrease your revenue?
of course you can get a pay raise  but those who have degrees will definitely get more increments than you.
if every worker is dispensible then yes sure I would try to pay them less

i get your point  if one worker proves his worth  he can be paid more. but at least i don't believe all non-degree holders can do this. not judging their abilities bc they don't have a degree but not EVERYONE can do well in their jobs  same for degree holders. but if having a degree can allow them to safeguard a higher pay in the future  i would believe that having a degree would be better.

Hii  does anyone know when the form teachers would see the students‚Äô results? Would it be earlier on the same day or a few days in advance?
results are usually released via 2 modes  online and offline (in the form of results slips)

Same day earlier so if youre anxious avoid all eye contact with all teachers
Your other subj chers will also see yours if theyre interested
unless the form teacher willing to share
My other subj chers all my class's results though
aka ur math teacher cant see ur chem grade simply
prob after o lvl results yes
on o lvl results day in the morning no
I mean like phy cher know your phy result
Some of the other teachers knew some students actual full results tho
ur subject cher will know ur subject result that he/she is teaching  but he/she wont know how u did for other subjects until like sometime aft o lvl results release
cos they will share thru a common ict platform

Do they know the exact percentage?
My teacher told my senior that if he had done better for one section of the maths paper then he could have scored better
Maybe your senior just discussed the paper with your teacher after the paper
Breaking news: if you get more marks you could get a better grade
Secret tips and tricks teachers don‚Äôt want you to know
How did the teacher know that he did badly in that one section of the paper?
If the teacher knew how he performed for one section of the paper  does that not mean that she knew the marks that he scored?
She told him ‚Äòif you did better for this (particular section) you would have gotten a better grade‚Äô
After the results were released last year
Something as specific as assuming which section of the paper he did badly in
Is like a little too specific
Maybe it was just a passing comment
I don‚Äôt think people do that?
Ya but reassurance based on a pretty far fetched assumption?
Let‚Äôs just leave this between your senior and your teacher  I think you would feel more at peace‚úåÔ∏è
no one will ever know the exact marks unless seab internal
and which teacher so free to find out the mark breakdown of every student
or even which questions they get wrong or correct
plus teachers only know whats up with the previous year exam papers when they go for briefing with seab
like this cohort did well in so and so topics
and did badly in so and so whatever
And what subject was that in?

Only thing I can understand teachers sayin that will be for science exams with practicals since that is marked by ur teachers so they know ur scores.Otherwise as long as the papers are marked by Cambridge  it is not possible to know the exact score.
The practicals are marked by the Teachers?
ya so ur teacher wont know
wah im done talking abt this le
basically theres no point worrying about ur exact raw score since u wont really know (unless you try to estimate)
Rubbish. That was the old SPA system. Its now back to a practical set by Cambridge for 3 years now...
From what I know its still internal marking since each school produces different practical results  making it impossible for standardisation if cambridge marks it.
Of course  you can correct me on this if you are a current MOE teacher teaching science
Very misinformed. A teacher does the practical at the same time as the students. The teachers results are used as a base to compare against students answers   and marked by Cambridge.
